entry.title: Zelensky Calls Russian Strike on Station a War Crime
entry.content: Russia is repositioning forces while Ukraine tries to evacuate civilians as both sides brace for battle in the east.

entry.title: Ukrainian Enclave in Brazil Offers Warm Welcome to War Refugees
entry.content: A tropical “Little Ukraine” is populated by descendants of Ukrainian immigrants who arrived decades ago and still maintain the old language and customs.

entry.title: In France, Inflation Tightens Race Between Macron and Far-Right Le Pen
entry.content: Polling shows Marine Le Pen closing in on President Emmanuel Macron ahead of elections Sunday, as the war in Ukraine ripples across Europe’s economic and political landscape.

entry.title: Shanghai's Omicron Outbreak Corners Chinese Leader
entry.content: Xi Jinping looked to ease China’s zero-Covid strategy until the highly contagious variant forced a return to strict lockdowns. He faces a dilemma other world leaders hope their countries never see again.
